title: champion select bug?
body: So i got into champion select, but there was no champions i could select...it was blank and i was forced to dodge and so now i got a 5 min bann? nothing was intentional, it was just blank. pls fix? so others wont have to deal with this bs

replies.body: Same here ... Enemies pick was stuck on 0sec left so i cant pick, then 5 min ban ...
I have had the exact same bug before, Its honestly such a joke and pathetic
